DPRK Taekwon-do Team Back 
    Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- An exhibition team of the DPRK Taekwon-Do Committee led by Chairman Hwang Pong Yong returned here Monday after attending the Taekwon-Do demonstration held in the south side's area.
